page.title: 02FAVOURITE TOYS
page.content: At the moment all the girls play mainly with{Cabbage Patch Kids,}but a lot of others play with{My Little {Ponys}and{Care Bears}. The{Cabbage Patch Kids}are dolls that you adopt.They cost Â£20 and come with a first and middle name,and when you send away their adoption papers they gain your surname.You get official adoption papers and on their first birthday they are sent a card. The boys' favourite toys are{computers whose memories range from{16k}to{64k. The most popular computer is the {Commodore 64. { Knight rider}toys and remote control cars are quite popular at present with the boys, as are{BMX stunt bikes}. { Barbie}and{Sindy}dolls are not as popular as they used to be;this is because of{Cabbage Patch Kids}.You can buy many accessories for these dolls.
